abstract: The executive, Teresa A. Dial, stepped down after a controversial 18-month tenure, during which she struggled to turn around the division.
snippet: The executive, Teresa A. Dial, stepped down after a controversial 18-month tenure, during which she struggled to turn around the division.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup announced on Monday that it would replace the head of its consumer banking business  the most troubled part of its financial empire  as the company braces for fresh troubles with home mortgages and credit cards this year.

headline.main: Citigroup Replaces Head of Consumer Banking
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Replaces Head Of Consumer Banking
